text: The ‘buy on dips’ sentiment has suddenly turned into ‘sell on rise’ in the Indian equity market, said Ashu Madan, president of equity broking at Religare Securities. Indian shares have fallen five times in the last six straight trading sessions, weighed down mostly by global volatility. The one-sided trend fuelled by optimism, which took the Nifty to nearly 9,000, has certainly been broken, Madan told BloombergQuint in a telephonic interview.Below is an edited excerpt of the interview.
title: It’s A ‘Sell On Rise’ Market; Reliance Is The Stock To Watch: Ashu Madan
